text.section:
Each contractor required to pay the prevailing wage rate shall:
keep payroll records covering work performed directly at the work site in accordance with regulations adopted by the Commissioner; and
allow the Commissioner or the public body to inspect the records at any reasonable time and as often as necessary.

section.section:
Each contractor shall submit a complete copy of the payroll records of the contractor and, for work performed at the work site, of the subcontractors in the form that the Commissioner specifies by regulation to:
the public body; and
the Commissioner.
The Commissioner and the public body shall make payroll records available for public inspection during regular business hours.

text.section:
If a contractor is late in submitting copies of the payroll records required under subsection (b) of this section:
the public body may postpone the processing of partial payment estimates under the public work contract pending receipt of the copies; and
the contractor shall be liable to the public body for liquidated damages of $10 for each calendar day the records are late.
